title: PromptStack Workflow AI Tool Stack
summary: Comprehensive AI-powered product development workflow using $260/month stack of ChatGPT, Claude, Perplexity, and Cursor, with detailed process from ideation through MVP using the VIBE methodology
key_points: $260/month AI stack replaces traditional dev team: ChatGPT ($20), Claude ($200), Perplexity ($20), Cursor ($20)
ChatGPT-4 for voice ideation and strategy, GPT-3.5 for documentation and red-teaming
Claude Code for primary development with MCP integration for codebase review
VIBE Cycles: Vision → Interface → Backend → Execution for rapid prototyping
Arc Browser for project organization and linking AI conversations
hooks: Your $260/month AI product development team: cheaper and faster than hiring
PromptStack is more than a codebase - it's a complete AI-native workflow
How to orchestrate ChatGPT, Claude, Perplexity, and Cursor as your virtual dev team
quotable_moments: That's your product development team. You've got to pay, right, cost. Instead of employee, this is your product dev team
ChatGPT is where you do a lot of your strategy. GPT-4 is going to be where you really ideate
You're not just building projects—you're building an AI-native product studio system
review_notes: Detailed practical workflow that transforms AI tools into a cohesive product development system. The 3-layer stack breakdown (Cognitive, Workspace, Build) provides excellent structure. Real pricing and limitations research adds credibility.
